alert.note: Alert for Northern Oregon Cascade Foothills (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 02 at 4:02AM PST until January 04 at 12:00AM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 4 AM MONDAY TO MIDNIGHT PST MONDAY NIGHT ABOVE 2000 FEET... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of up to 18 inches. Winds gusting as high as 55 mph. * WHERE...Northern Oregon Cascade Foothills above 2000 feet. * WHEN...From 4 AM Monday to midnight PST Monday night. * IMPACTS...Travel will be very hazardous above 2000 feet in elevation. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Strong winds could cause tree damage.
info.instruction: Keep an eye on the forecast for updates on this situation. Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Slow down and allow extra time when travelling. Practice your winter safety rules. Keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your car in case of emergency. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1, or visit https://www.tripcheck.com
